data.author: Wesley Clark
data.quote: When Bill Clinton ran in '92, and I listened to him, and I had of course known of his record from Arkansas, I found him extraordinarily inspirational, and I voted Democratic.

data.author: Martina Navratilova
data.quote: I've a great family, two children to take care of. Then, of course, I do commentary for TV. I do speak about various women's issues around the world - like LGBT, motivational speeches. I have a lot on my plate right now. But eventually, yes, I would like to pass on the knowledge and something that I would like to do.

data.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
data.quote: However things may seem, no evil thing is success and no good thing is failure.

data.author: Bill Cosby
data.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.

data.author: Tennessee Williams
data.quote: Luxury is the wolf at the door and its fangs are the vanities and conceits germinated by success. When an artist learns this, he knows where the danger is.

data.author: Lisa Morton
data.quote: Some say I'm an overnight success. Well, that was a very long night that lasted about 10 years.

data.author: Paramahansa Yogananda
data.quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.

data.author: Jonathan Taylor Thomas
data.quote: Success is not in never failing, but rising everytime you fall!

data.author: Colin Kaepernick
data.quote: The NFL is a performance-based business, so you should have to perform to earn some of your money. At the same time, I realize that my success isn't just because of what I do out there.

data.author: Matthew Henry
data.quote: After a storm comes a calm.

data.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
data.quote: Failure is not an option. Everyone has to succeed.

data.author: Rose Leslie
data.quote: It is so inspirational, to see that in the world of Westeros, men are answering to women, and they are a force to be reckoned with. It's empowering, and it's inspirational as well, because you're just like, 'This is great!'

data.author: Leonardo DiCaprio
data.quote: I've been very lucky to have achieved a lot of the things that I dreamt of achieving as a young man. But, at the end of the day - and I truly believe this - it is not about achieving great wealth or success. Because they don't bring happiness, ultimately.

data.author: Peter James
data.quote: There are people who can achieve huge success in life, while adding a bit of fun and a splash of colour to this increasingly grey world.

data.author: Christopher Reeve
data.quote: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take.

data.author: William Shakespeare
data.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.

data.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones
data.quote: For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end.

data.author: Wiz Khalifa
data.quote: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success.

data.author: Dee Hock
data.quote: Success follows those adept at preserving the substance of the past by clothing it in the forms of the future.

data.author: Richard Gere
data.quote: The secret of my success is my hairspray.
